title: Appetite for Destruction - Guns N Roses
content:
[url=http://www.shareapic.net/content.php?id=3798029&owner=Rorie][img]http://preview.shareapic.net/preview/003798029.jpg[/img][/url]

i finally took djaser's advice & got the number 1 rock album of the 1980s. i love the songs but almost every single one of them is about drugs thanks to steven adler who wrote most of them. poor bloke he quit drugs several times before in the past but now he admits he can't kick his habit, he even confessed to spending $300 a night on drugs. it's only a matter of time before he kills himself. skid row even wrote a song about adler. wasted time on the slave to the grind album. anyway enough about drugs do you like this album? please tellRorie

title: Re: Appetite for Destruction - Guns N Roses
content:
Good you like it but I think numer 1 rock album of the 80s goes a bit to far. Also most songs are not about drugs and none of them were written by Adler. The only song that's about drugs that I can think of is Mr Brownstone.
